name: Pull (itch) (Doku)
description:
Is the legend you heard in your childhood true?

Pull is an easygoing puzzle platformer with a focus on your character's main ability: throwing and pulling a ball. Your journey will take you through the puzzle-filled castle from legends, but don't forget to return to your hometown and see what people have to say.

Controls: Mouse and Keyboard

Average playthrough: 50 mins

Follow me on twitter!
